name: Lego Star Wars The Complete Saga
notes:
Depending on your gamepad you have to either deactivate the *(event) or *(js) device in the joystick control panel (you have to try which).

You might encounter issues when changing the resolution in game. Then just restart and your proper resolution will be shown.

If your camera is weirdly placed on the ground after starting a new game, exit to menu (with keyboard) and start a new game again.

extract.description: Installing x360 dinput8 for controller support

content:
files:
- X360: https://lutris.net/files/tools/x360ce-dinput8.tar.gz
- setup: N/A:Select Windows GOG setup exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/LEGO Star Wars/LEGOStarWarsSaga.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Windows File System (Wine Bottle)
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    description: Installing x360 dinput8 for controller support
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/LEGO Star Wars/
    file: X360
wine:
  xinput: true
